title: Spinach, chorizo and artichoke pizza with a baby leaf spinach salad
description: Combine the wonderful flavours of chorizo and artichoke to make a truly delicious homemade pizza.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz strong white flour, plus extra for dusting
6 baby artichokes, peeled, trimmed and thinly sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 little gem lettuce, separated into leaves
